name: Gem of Aqua
description:
Your village has been dry for ages. This is because a gem was stolen from your deity of water, Aqua ages ago. Now your brother has come upon this jewel, asking you to deliver it to the temple of Aqua. The journey won't be easy, but to bring water back to your village, you must do it.

Credits:

Puzzle Mechanic Design, Programming & Boss Level : Christian "CptMupfel"

Level Design & Art : Tim "Timmythy"

Music & SFX : Felix "FelixWilson"

Art : "Velture"

Art : Audrey "Derplicorn"
